summary: A simple, marriageable, companion mod I modeled after my girlfriend.
descriptionHtml:
Add a new companion, modeled after my girlfriend, to The Sleeping Giant inn in Riverwood. She is marriageable and comes equipped with leather armor and an orcish sword and bow.

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii is required and can be found at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

The outfit she is using in the screenshots is Osare GothicLolita - UNP by anano, and can be found here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17727/?
author: slothocalypse
